description.text:
Module that contains GX specific identities, including:
- equipment types (chassis, cards, toms)
- PM parameters
- Alarm types
YANG Models for Infinera Open API (IOA) for release R6.0
YANG Models for Infinera Open API (IOA) for release R5.2
YANG Models for Infinera Open API (IOA) for release R5.1
YANG Models for Infinera Open API (IOA) for release R5.0
YANG Models for Infinera Open API (IOA) for release R4.1

1RU Chassis for G31.
Has the following features:
- front panel houses 1 FRCU31 controllers and 4 slots for line cards.
- rear panel houses 2 PEMs, 3 main Fans and 1 IOPANEL.
- supports both AC and DC power suply.

3RU Chassis for GX.
Has the following features:
- front panel houses 2 XMM4 controllers, 1 IO Panel and 4 slots for line cards.
- rear panel houses 4 PEMs, 2 XMM4 Fans, 5 main Fans and 1 Fan Controller.
- supports both AC and DC power suply.

4RU Chassis for GX.
Has the following features:
- front panel houses 2 FRCU controllers, 4 service rows for double width slot line-card(s).
- front panel also houses 2 PEMs, 2 Fan trays.
- Hw support for both AC and DC power supply.

2RU Chassis for GX.
Has the following features:
- front panel houses 2 FRCU32 controllers, 8 slots for line cards.
- rear panel houses 4 PEMs, 3 Fan trays, 2 IO Panel.
- Hw support for both AC and DC power supply.
FRCU31: Field Replaceable Shelf Controller for G31.
UTM2: Universal Transponder Muxponder type II
CHM1R: Coherent Module of type I, with ZR/ZR+/openROADM line optics
RD09SM: dual-sled carrier card with broadcast & select 1x9 ROADM degree including pre-amplifier, booster, 1x9 WSS and 1x9 splitter and 2xOCM
RD20TM: dual-sled carrier card with route & select 1x20 ROADM degree including pre-amplifier, booster, 1x20 twin WSS and 2xOCM
OCC2T: Optical carrier card of type II
CAD16AOFP2: colorless Add/Drop 16A Optical Form Factor Pluggable 2
BAX OFP2: High Power Variable Gain Booster Amplifier with High Gain Range
DGE OFP2: High Power Variable Gain Booster Amplifier with High Gain Range
WSS OFP2: Broadcast and Select OFP2 Wavelength Selective Switch
RPBM: Raman card with backward propagation Raman amplification
RPBL: Raman card with backward propagation Raman amplification with low span loss support
OMD48S 48 channel optical multiplexer/ demultiplexer - 1RU equipment
OMD48E wide band 48 channel optical multiplexer/ demultiplexer - 2RU equipment
XMM4 Fan Module - provides cooling to the XMM4 controller cards.
FAN controller module - controls chassis FANs.
CHM6L (Coherent Module with ICE6 L-Band) Transponder.
XMM4 (GX Main Module 4) - Main Controller card
Field Replaceable Shelf Controller for G32.
Input/Output Panel - Auxiliary panel with port and chassis level LEDs
Input/Output Panel for G32 chassis - Auxiliary panel with port and chassis level LEDs
Fan Module - provides cooling to the chassis line cards.
Fan Module for G32 chassis - provides cooling to the chassis line cards.
Fan Module for G34c chassis - provides cooling to the chassis line cards.
PEM (Power Entry Module) - Provides AC or DC power to the chassis.
Generic Blank card, with multiple form factors (single slot).
Generic Blank card, with multiple form factors (double slot).
PM parameter for PEM Output Voltage
PM parameter for PEM Output Current
PM parameter for IOPANEL Outlet Temperature
PM parameter for DCO Temperature (CHM6/L only)
Aggregate CPU utilization across all cores
Transmit Power from PIC to EDFA Input
Transmit Output Optical Power of the CHM6
Receive Optical Power of the CHM6
Receive Optical Power Delivered to the PIC

This is a tia gain for polarization x branch 2
This is a tia gain for polarization y branch 1
This is a tia gain for polarization y branch 2

This is a tia out balance for polarization x branch 2

This is a tia out balance for polarization y branch 2
